trans-unit.source: Implements a custom upgrade provider, inherited from this <see langword="abstract" /> base class.
trans-unit.target: 实现自定义升级提供程序，从此 <see langword="abstract" /> 基类继承。

trans-unit.source: An example of a stream upgrade is to build a compression stream directly on top of the transport stream.
trans-unit.target: 流升级的一个示例是直接在传输流之上生成压缩流。

trans-unit.source: To add a security upgrade, you additionally implement a class that derives from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamSecurityUpgradeProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加安全升级，还需实现派生自 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamSecurityUpgradeProvider> 的类。

trans-unit.source: You can implement multiple upgrades, each wrapping the preceding one.
trans-unit.target: 可以实现多次升级，每次升级都包装前一次升级。

trans-unit.source: The upgrade process has the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 升级过程步骤如下：

trans-unit.source: Implement a class that derives from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 实现从 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider> 派生的类。

trans-unit.source: Register it.
trans-unit.target: 注册提供程序。

trans-unit.source: You do this by creating a binding element for it, and registering the provider in a custom binding.
trans-unit.target: 具体方法是，为提供程序创建一个绑定元素，然后在自定义绑定中注册该提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The derived class that you implement creates an instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator>, which at run time initiates a request to the other end of its connection to upgrade the channel transport layer.
trans-unit.target: 实现的派生类创建 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator> 的实例，此实例在运行时向其连接的另一端发出升级通道传输层的请求。

trans-unit.source: The derived class that you implement creates an instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor>, which at run time receives the upgrade request from the preceding step and, if possible, accepts the upgrade and returns the upgraded stream to the other side of its connection.
trans-unit.target: 实现的派生类创建 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor> 的实例，此实例在运行时接收上一步骤中的升级请求，如果可以，则接受升级，并将升级流返回其连接的另一端。

trans-unit.source: If there are additional upgrade requests, they are processed sequentially, as described in the preceding two steps.
trans-unit.target: 如果还有其他升级请求，则按前面两个步骤依次进行处理。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: To set explicit values for time-out properties, use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置超时属性的显式值，请使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider.%23ctor%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider.%23ctor%2A>, which will set the time-out properties to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，请使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider.%23ctor%2A>，它将超时属性设置为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Time-out properties are set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 超时属性设置为 `null`。

trans-unit.source: The default communication time-outs.
trans-unit.target: 默认通信超时值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The provided time-outs control the default Open and Close time-outs for a transport using this upgrade provider.
trans-unit.target: 提供的超时值对使用此升级提供程序的传输的默认打开和关闭超时值进行控制。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor" /> 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: This method creates the associated UpgradeAcceptor for this upgrade provider that can accept upgrade requests from the matching UpgradeInitiator.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为该升级提供程序创建关联的 UpgradeAcceptor，它可接受匹配的 UpgradeInitiator 发出的升级请求。

trans-unit.source: Endpoint address for the channel.
trans-unit.target: 通道的终结点地址。

trans-unit.source: The address of the Via URI (an intermediate URI through which communication may be routed).
trans-unit.target: Via URI（一个中间 URI，通信可以通过它进行路由）的地址。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator" /> 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: This method creates the associated <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator> for this upgrade provider that creates upgrade requests for the matching <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor> at the endpoint provided.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为该升级提供程序创建关联的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator>，用于在提供的终结点处为匹配的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor> 创建升级请求。

trans-unit.source: Gets the DefaultCloseTimeout.
trans-unit.target: 获取 DefaultCloseTimeout。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> for the DefaultCloseTimeout.
trans-unit.target: 返回 DefaultCloseTimeout 的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the DefaultOpenTimeout.
trans-unit.target: 获取 DefaultOpenTimeout。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> for the DefaultOpenTimeout.
trans-unit.target: 返回 DefaultOpenTimeout 的 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 当前流的类型。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets a property of the current stream that represents an initiator of a stream upgrade.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中实现时，获取当前流的一个属性，该属性表示流升级的发起方。

trans-unit.source: An initiator of a stream upgrade.
trans-unit.target: 流升级的发起方。
